name: Cull The Gods
description:
Through fast paced, skill-oriented combat Cull the Gods gives the player the chance to live out their all powerful, god slaying fantasy when they battle opposing deities. Using the might of their sword, skill and determination they tackle the challenge of culling the gods that plague the world. Only those who are truly worthy can complete this challenge.

It is a third person arcade styled beat ‘em up which the gameplay is more focused on skilled timing and fast paced combat. There are too many "gods" that exist within mankind and are destroying the fabric of the world with their constant fighting. In a last attempt to restore peace to the world, you are chosen by a divine being and given the ability to deflect any incoming attack, in order to cull the gods.

If you really want to help us out could you fill out this feedback form? Any feedback is greatly appreciated and it will help us improve our game!
